title: Queimada
body: It is a populated place in the parish of Água de Pena belonging to the municipality of Machico. In this place and in the year 1924, Francisco de Freitas Correia had a chapel dedicated to Our Lady of Perpetual Help built, the first of this invocation to be built in Madeira.

Madeira: Location of the construction of the chapel

Francisco de Freitas Correia: Commissioned the construction of the chapel

1924: Year of the construction of the chapel
